protein.specific_function: Alpha-L-fucosidase is responsible for hydrolyzing the alpha-1,6-linked fucose joined to the reducing-end N-acetylglucosamine of the carbohydrate moieties of glycoproteins.

go_class.description: hydrolase activity, acting on glycosyl bonds

reference.reference_text: Seo HC, Willems PJ, Kretz KA, Martin BM, O'Brien JS: Fucosidosis: four new mutations and a new polymorphism. Hum Mol Genet. 1993 Apr;2(4):423-9.
